snippet: The Times's political unit is on the ground in the Hawkeye State -- with the candidates and at the caucus sites -- to provide live updates and analysis as the 2012 nominating contests begin.
abstract: The Times's political unit is on the ground in the Hawkeye State -- with the candidates and at the caucus sites -- to provide live updates and analysis as the 2012 nominating contests begin.
lead_paragraph: Caucusgoers all over Iowa are gathering in their communities Tuesday night to pick a Republican nominee for president. The Times's political unit is on the ground in the Hawkeye State -- with the candidates and at the caucus sites -- to provide live updates and analysis of the 2012 nominating contests. Follow along on the live dashboard and on Twitter (@thecaucus), get real-time results and dig deeper into the numbers with FiveThirtyEight.
